java/liquibase/parser/visitor/RollbackVisitor.java

00001 package liquibase.parser.visitor;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.exception.LiquibaseException;
00006 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00007 
00008 public class RollbackVisitor implements ChangeSetVisitor {
00009 
00010     private Database database;
00011 
00012     public RollbackVisitor(Database database) {
00013         this.database = database;
00014     }
00015 
00016     public Direction getDirection() {
00017         return ChangeSetVisitor.Direction.REVERSE;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public void visit(ChangeSet changeSet, Database database) throws LiquibaseException {
00021         LogFactory.getLogger().info("Rolling Back Changeset:" + changeSet);
00022         changeSet.rolback(this.database);
00023         this.database.removeRanStatus(changeSet);
00024 
00025         this.database.commit();
00026 
00027     }
00028 }
